title: 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Regulation
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Chemicals Act 2008 (CLP
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Chemicals Act 2008 (CLP 

Regulation) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited chemical act 2008 (clp regulation) regulation 2024

title: 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Regulation
heading: 2. Section 2(1) of the Chemicals Act 2008 (No. 13 of 2008) is amended, in
text_raw:
2. Section 2(1) of the Chemicals Act 2008 (No. 13 of 2008) is amended, in 
paragraph (c) of the definition of “chemical”, by the substitution of “mixture” 
for “preparation”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 December, 2024. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

1 OJ No. L 353, 31.12.2008, p. 1. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th December, 2024.
